sentences.en: At the end of each level, there’s an exam.
sentences.cn: 在每一级别结束时都有一次考试。

sentences.en: From his manner, we drew the inference that he was satisfied with the exam.
sentences.cn: 我们从他的态度来推断,他对这次测验很满意.

sentences.en: How did you do in your exams?
I am determined to take the entrance exam.
I didn't do too well on the exam , but I think I got by.
sentences.cn: 我考得不太好, 但我想能及格.

sentences.en: I think I did OK in the exam.
I was all of a sweat before the exam.
Limits will be placed on the number of exam retakes students can sit.
sentences.cn: 学生参加重考的次数将受到限制。

sentences.en: She is always all of a sweat before the exam.
sentences.cn: 她临考前总是急得不得了.

sentences.en: She's cramming for her history exam.
sentences.cn: 她考历史之前临时抱佛脚.

sentences.en: They had finished the exam and the teacher was hustling to get the papers gathered up.
sentences.cn: 他们已经考完试了，老师正在赶紧收卷子。

sentences.en: You did fantastically well in the exam.
You've done so much work that you're bound to pass the exam.
sentences.cn: 你下了这麽大工夫,一定能考及格.

trans.tran_en: a spoken or written test of knowledge, especially an important one
